data.name: Queen's Brothel
data.detailed_description:
Queen's Brothel is an ambitious project led by a team who believes in telling beautiful and fun stories. Queen's Brothel has many playable characters, each with their own individual goals and aspirations that players can relate to. Join Queen as she travels into foreign land to start her own business, a brothel.


  • High Quality Sex Animations
  • 100+ Unique Sex Images
  • RPG-like mechanics where you level up body parts instead of standard combat stats
  • Many outfits for the girls to wear
  • Modding capabilities



Queen's Brothel main fetishes:
  • Freeuse
  • Bukkake
  • Bored / Ignored
  • Gang bangs
  • Futanari

data.short_description: An action RPG about a girl named Queen who travels into foreign land to start her own business, a brothel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHZ Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 2.0GHZ Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 2.0GHZ Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Queen's Brothel contains consensual sex between many species. Species includes humans, anthro-wolves, goblins, anthro-horsemen, orcs, elves and monsters.

Queen's Brothel contains frequent alcohol use.
